message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $10000. This is a high-quality item that I believe would greatly benefit you, considering its value to you is $8000. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on your product, but considering my budget and the product's worth to me, I would like to propose a price of $9500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. In light of that, I would like to propose a price of $9750 for the product. This still allows for a reasonable profit while considering the value you see in it. I look forward to your response.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints and the product's value to me, I would like to propose a price of $9600. I hope this proposal is acceptable and we can move forward with the transaction.
